## Welcome to tutorial 1!

The training is designed to allow you to be able to interact with R code while learning. As such, each lesson contains links to tutorials hosted on GitHub that allow you to run R without needing to open R on your local device. You will find the tutorials for this week's session below:


[R Packages](getting_started/rpackages.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}

[Data types](getting_started/rdata_types.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
[Data structures](getting_started/rdata_structures2.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
[Importing data](getting_started/rimporting_data.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
[R indexing](getting_started/rindexing.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
